item.title: Launched ClickHouse support, crossed 4k stars on GitHub -Signal 02
item.description: SigNoz is now available with ClickHouse as a storage backend. This and other updates on what we've been upto at SigNoz. And yes, we trended at number 1 on GitHub trending.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: Launching support for ClickHouse as storage backend for SigNoz
item.description: In this article, we dig deeper into why we decided to extend support for ClickHouse as a storage backend for SigNoz and the efficiency gains we achieved using it.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: Our first community update - Signal
item.description: Excited to launch our first newsletter. We are delighted to have crossed 1.6k stars on GitHub, growing more than 30% last month. Catch up on what we're upto at SigNoz!
item.author: undefined (undefined)
